Thanks Dave!

Now I can compile the f77 cantera demo.

Michele


David Goodwin ha scritto:

> Michele,
>
> The f77 demo program needs a small update to work with Cantera 1.6. Do
> this:
>
> 1. In file "demo_ftnlib.cpp" add the line
>
> #include <cantera/Cantera.h>
>
> before the first include statement.
>
> 2. If you are using the gnu f77 compiler, also add
> "-fno-second-underscore" to "FORT_FLAGS" in demo.mak
>
>
> This should fix the problem.
>
> Dave
>
>
> On Jul 6, 2005, at 1:04 AM, Michele Vascellari wrote:
>
> > Hi,
> >
> > I want to create an fortran 77 interface for c++ cantera libraries
> > under
> > Linux (I'm using gcc 3.3.5).
> > I don't have problems using Cantera in C++, python, etc, so I think
> > that
> > cantera works fine on my machine.
> >
> > But when I try to compile the f77 demo and the example program,
> > generated by ctnew (ctnew -f77),
> > I obtain the following errors:
> >
> > g++ -c demo_ftnlib.cpp -I/usr/local/include -O3 -Wall
> > In file included from /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ct_defs.h:21,
> >                  from /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/State.h:22,
> >                  from /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/Phase.h:16,
> >                  from
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ThermoPhase.h:20,
> >                  from
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/IdealGasPhase.h:21,
> >                  from /usr/local/include/cantera/IdealGasMix.h:6,
> >                  from demo_ftnlib.cpp:35:
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/config.h:17:26: ../../config.h: No
> > such file or directory
> > In file included from /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ct_defs.h:33,
> >                  from /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/State.h:22,
> >                  from /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/Phase.h:16,
> >                  from
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ThermoPhase.h:20,
> >                  from

> >                  from /usr/local/include/cantera/IdealGasMix.h:6,
> >                  from demo_ftnlib.cpp:35:
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ctvector.h:35: error: parse error
> > before `*'
> >    token
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ctvector.h:55: error: syntax error
> > before `('
> >    token
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ctvector.h: In member function `int
> >    ct::ctvector_fp::operator[](unsigned int) const':
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ctvector.h:47: error: `_data'
> > undeclared
> >    (first use this function)
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ctvector.h:47: error: (Each
> > undeclared
> >    identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in.)
> > /usr/local/include/cantera/kernel/ctvector.h: In member function `int
> >    ct::ctvector_fp::back() const':

> >    (first use this function)
